data.title: Central Technical Training Institute
data.text:
· CLIENT : Railway

· YEAR : 2019 to continue

· Area/Location : 1.Dhaka 2. Chottugram

· Course Name : (i) House Keeping (ii) Plumbing (iii) Swing machine Operation

· Project Description :

Finance Division, Ministry of Finance has undertaken a project named Skills for Employment Investment Program (SEIP) in order to develop skilled workforce for priority industry sectors of Bangladesh with financial support from Asian Development Bank (ADB) and Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC). The prime objective of this project is to impart market responsive job focused inclusive training to increase the productivity of trained graduates and also improve their employability in the job market. SEIP Project is implementing this training program in partnership with the Industry Associations. Palli Karma-Sahayak Foundation being one of the major industry associations has got grants from SEIP to conduct training on different trades of priority sectors determined by the Government. In order to reach a target of 22000 trainees within 5.5 years, Palli Karma-Sahayak Foundation’s doesn’t provide technical skill training directly. Considering this, Palli Karma-Sahayak Foundation has decided to partner with other quality training institutes working in this area.
